This app needs access to Apple Music library to provide music-related features.
This app needs access to your photo library to manage images.
This app needs access to your camera to take photos.
This app needs access to your microphone to record audio.
This app needs access to your contacts for contact management features.
This app needs access to your calendar to manage events.
This app needs access to your reminders to manage tasks.
This app needs access to your location when in use for location-based features.
This app needs access to your location always for background location features.
This app needs access to speech recognition for voice features.
This app would like to track you across apps and websites to provide personalized content.
This app uses Face ID for secure authentication.
This app needs access to motion data for activity tracking.
This app needs access to health data for health-related features.
This app needs access to Bluetooth for device connectivity.
This app needs access to Bluetooth for peripheral device connectivity.
This app needs access to local network for device discovery.
